title: How to Use Hulu.com Activate My Device + Troubleshooting

steps.title: Open the Hulu app on your smart TV or streaming device.
steps.content: Open the Hulu app on your smart TV or streaming device. If you're setting up Hulu on a new device, you'll need to activate it at Hulu.com. First, open the Hulu app on the device you want to activate.

steps.title: Select Log In.
steps.content: Select Log In . This is on the Welcome screen. You can skip this step if you've already logged in.

steps.title: Select Activate on a computer.
steps.content: Select Activate on a computer . You'll see an Activation Code on the next screen. To finish activating your device, you'll need to use your web browser.

steps.title: On a web browser, go to http://www.hulu.com/activate.
steps.content: On a web browser, go to http://www.hulu.com/activate . You can use a desktop or mobile browser to activate a Hulu device.

steps.title: Log into your account.
steps.content: Log into your account. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now.

steps.title: Enter the activation code.
steps.content: Enter the activation code. This is the code on your TV. Once the activation code is accepted, you'll be logged in to Hulu on your device, and you can start streaming your favorite shows and movies. It can take up to 30 seconds to activate your device. If you're having trouble activating a device on Hulu.com, jump down to our Troubleshooting tips.

steps.title: Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account in a web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://secure.hulu.com/account in a web browser. If you want to deactivate a Hulu device, you can do so using a desktop or web mobile browser. If you aren't already logged in, enter your email address and password to do so now. There is no limit to the number of devices you can install the Hulu app on. However, you can only stream Hulu on two screens at the same time. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Click Manage Devices.
steps.content: Click Manage Devices . You can find this in the Your Account tile. A pop-up window will open with all devices linked to your account.

steps.title: Click Remove next to the device.
steps.content: Click Remove next to the device. You should see the device type and date it was added to your account. The device will be signed out of your account.

steps.title: Make sure your login information is correct.
steps.content: Make sure your login information is correct. If you can't log into Hulu.com, check that your email address and password are correct. If needed, you can reset your Hulu password . [2] X Research source

steps.title: Double-check your activation code.
steps.content: Double-check your activation code. If Hulu.com is not accepting the activation code displayed on your device, you may be typing it incorrectly.

steps.title: Generate a new activation code.
steps.content: Generate a new activation code. The activation code on your TV should work for 30 minutes. If it has been more than 30 minutes since the activation code appeared on the TV screen, you'll need to start the process over to get a new one. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Try opening hulu.com/activate in an incognito or private browsing window.
steps.content: Try opening hulu.com/activate in an incognito or private browsing window. Your ad blocker or other privacy extensions may be preventing Hulu.com from activating your device. An easy way to test this is to open an incognito or private browsing window (you can do this on any device), go to hulu.com/activate, and try activating again. If activating the device works when you're in incognito mode, the issue is likely related to a web browser extension or a problem with saved cookies.

steps.title: Restart your web browser.
steps.content: Restart your web browser. If the Hulu website isn't loading, you may need to close your browser and open it again. If the website still won't load, clear your browser's cache . If you still have trouble, use an alternative browser, such as Chrome , Firefox, Edge, or Safari.

steps.title: Check your subscription status.
steps.content: Check your subscription status. If you can log into the Hulu website but not any other devices, you may need to update your payment method or reactivate your subscription . Visit your account page to edit your subscription. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Contact Hulu support for help.
steps.content: Contact Hulu support for help. If you still can't activate a device on Hulu.com, don't worryâ€”Hulu support can help. To contact support, go to https://auth.hulu.com/sso/salesforce/login/enter-email and log in to your account. [5] X Research source
